parameters: Alright...\| Time to get some work done.
It's Lolbit Land...\| There's been another body found there...
Someone should probably do something about that...\| Someone that's not me.
Sorry Guy, I'm a little caught up at the moment.
I know what i need to do.
Here it is.\! See Clay, he's dead.
I can't believe i'm doing this...
Wait...\. That hand print...\. I-It was Fresh...
It's your son Charleston, He's been...\| Kidnapped...
I saw them take him into that abandoned nacho resteraunt.\|
You gotta come quick- I-\.I don't have long...
The nacho place?..\| I'm on my way.
Clay opens the door only to find Yellow Guy's lifeless body resting
on the dashboard covered in blood...\| As soon as he processes it
he closes the car door and backs away.
This place looks a lot different then I remember...
I think this is where it came from.
That's odd...\! There's an old Frebby suit in here...
Fred.\! Where's my son you bastard!!
And Charleston was never here, I just used that to lure you in.
This is the basement of Zacc's.
You killed my dad, so now I'm gonna kill you.
No.\| I can't leave him in there.
I was going on a stakeout later and i was wondering if...\|
I dunno maybe you wanted to tag along?
I leave at 8:00, I'll pick you up then.
That sounded just like Charleston...\| You wait here, I'll go investigate
We should really stop letting inmates use these toilets.
Hey\..\..\.. shouldn't you be like...\| dead?
You blew up\..\..\..\|and then got stabbed...
I don't know what you're talking about
